class_notes: This course is cross-listed with GH 550. If EPI 532 is full, you may still register for GH550 as it is the same course.
course_description: Prerequisite/concurrent: EPI 530 or EPI 504. The purpose of the course is to familiarize students with the current purview of sexually transmitted disease in the developing and industrialized world.
schedule_location: M 10am-11:50am in R. Randall Rollins Bldg. R344
sections: Class Nbr: 1103, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: M 10-11:50a, Instructor: Spaulding/Beasley, Status: Open
